entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 3:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SSE 29 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
